Package toxi.geom

Class Matrix4x4

java.lang.Object
toxi.geom.Matrix4x4
public class Matrix4x4 extends Object
Implements a simple row-major 4x4 matrix class, all matrix operations are applied to new instances. Use transpose() to convert from column-major formats...
